EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - 04.2015 - Canada
EmailTemplate.subject: Register for the Upcoming vAuto April Webinars!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register for the Upcoming vAuto April Webinars!
vAuto offers ongoing webinars to help our dealers improve their successes in new and used vehicles.
Please see below for a schedule of upcoming webinars and topics, and simply click on the register button for each webinar. Once registered, you will receive webinar login details via email. Effective Online Merchandising Gail Rubinstein - Performance Manager, Canada
This webinar will focus on online used vehicle merchandising best practices for Canadian dealers. Click the Register button below for more details and to register. April 7 - 10AM PT/11AM MT/12PM CT/1PM ET <https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/2475617865028144386> Sales Process Webinar Darrel Ferguson - Senior Performance Manager
vAuto recognizes that the Internet isn’t a part of the used car business…it is the used car business. vAuto's Defending Market Price training course introduces a new Internet-driven sales process. Click the Register button below for more details and to register. April 9 - 10AM PT/11AM MT/12PM CT/1PM ET
<https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/rt/4807222432077040642> Velocity Webinar Glenn Holley - Senior Performance Manager
Learn about vAuto's Velocity Method of Management and how to maximize your ROI with the vAuto system using best practices. Click the Register button below for more details and to register. April 16 - 10AM PT/11AM MT/12PM CT/1PM ET
<https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/rt/1785851340191217409> Contact Us <#>
